mapper.insert: INSERT INTO item (price, quantity, name, entry_date, modify_date, member_seller_id, category_id) VALUES(#{price}, #{quantity}, #{name}, NOW(), NOW(),#{memberSellerId}, #{categoryId})
mapper.select: SELECT * from item INNER JOIN member ON item.member_seller_id = member.id
SELECT * from item INNER JOIN member ON item.member_seller_id = member.id WHERE category_id = #{categoryId}
SELECT * from item INNER JOIN member ON item.member_seller_id = member.id WHERE member_seller_id = #{memberSellerId}
SELECT * from item INNER JOIN member ON item.member_seller_id = member.id WHERE item.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE item SET name = #{name}, price = #{price}, quantity = #{quantity}, modify_date = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
